attr.title: Cursed Castilla (Maldita Castilla EX)
attr.desc: Cursed Castilla (Maldita Castilla EX) is an arcade action platformer full of creatures from medieval myths from Spain and the rest of Europe, as well as from chivalric romances. The extended version of the classic Maldita Castilla, originally created by the indie Locomalito.
attr.inst:
Buy the game on Steam. Open the Steam console and use the following command to download the compatible version of the game: download_depot 534290 534291 8142126060031850682
Copy all game files into the assets folder.
attr.inst_md:
Buy the game on [Steam](store.steampowered.com/app/534290/Cursed_Castilla_Maldita_Castilla_EX). Open the [Steam console](steam://open/console) and use the following command to download the compatible version of the game: `download_depot 534290 534291 8142126060031850682`
Copy all game files into the `assets` folder.
